SELECT
DATE_FORMAT(visit_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS time
DATE_FORMAT(visit_date, '%Y-%m') AS time
DATE_FORMAT(visit_date, '%Y') AS time
, COUNT(*) AS num FROM registration
visit_date >= #{startDate}
AND visit_date <= #{endDate}
GROUP BY time ORDER BY time

SELECT
DATE_FORMAT(transaction_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS time
DATE_FORMAT(transaction_time, '%Y-%m') AS time
DATE_FORMAT(transaction_time, '%Y') AS time
DATE_FORMAT(transaction_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS time
, SUM(CASE WHEN transaction_type='PAY' THEN amount WHEN transaction_type='REFUND' THEN -amount ELSE 0 END) AS num FROM transaction WHERE transaction_time >= #{startDate} AND transaction_time <= #{endDate} AND business_type IN ('REGISTRATION', 'MEDICAL_ITEM', 'DRUG') GROUP BY time ORDER BY time
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(MIN(transaction_time), '%Y-%m-%d') FROM transaction WHERE transaction_type = 'PAY' AND business_type IN ('REGISTRATION', 'MEDICAL_ITEM', 'DRUG')

SELECT business_type AS type, SUM(CASE WHEN transaction_type = 'PAY' THEN amount WHEN transaction_type = 'REFUND' THEN -amount ELSE 0 END) AS amount FROM transaction WHERE transaction_time >= #{startDate} AND transaction_time <= #{endDate} AND business_type IN ('REGISTRATION', 'MEDICAL_ITEM', 'DRUG') GROUP BY business_type ORDER BY business_type

SELECT d.department_id, d.department_name, COALESCE(SUM( CASE WHEN t.transaction_type = 'PAY' THEN t.amount WHEN t.transaction_type = 'REFUND' THEN -t.amount ELSE 0 END ), 0) AS amount FROM transaction t JOIN registration r ON t.registration_id = r.registration_id JOIN department d ON r.department_id = d.department_id WHERE t.transaction_time >= #{startDate} AND t.transaction_time <= #{endDate} GROUP BY d.department_id, d.department_name ORDER BY d.department_id

SELECT
DATE_FORMAT(transaction_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS date
DATE_FORMAT(transaction_time, '%Y-%m') AS date
DATE_FORMAT(transaction_time, '%Y') AS date
, SUM(amount) AS amount FROM transaction WHERE transaction_type = 'REFUND' AND transaction_time >= #{startDate} AND transaction_time <= #{endDate} GROUP BY date ORDER BY date
